metadata.dc:author: Fernández Lerones, M J
Pérez Martín, A
Asensio Lahoz, L A
Millán Sagaste, M L
Acinas García, O
Guezmes Domingo, A J
Monge Mirallas, J M
metadata.dc:description: We present a case of penile malignant melanoma. Its rarity of less than 1% of masculine genital malignant neoplasms, the absence of standardised protocols as for other neoplasms, impel us to its publication.
metadata.dc:title: Melanoma de pene.
[Melanoma of the penis].
